bibl.title: The Papyrus Industry in the Early Islamic Era. Avec résumés en anglais et en français.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Protocols and State involvement in the industry. - The price of papyrus. - The limits of the relationship between the producers and the government. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Malczycki W. Matt, The Papyrus Industry in the Early Islamic Era. Avec résumés en anglais et en français.
Introduction. - Protocols and State involvement in the industry. - The price of papyrus. - The limits of the relationship between the producers and the government. - Conclusion.
